action.action-desc: Mr. Weber of Texas (for himself, Mr. Nehls, Mr. Crenshaw, Mr. Babin, and Mr. Gill of Texas) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To require benefit eligibility determinations to be made within a certain period of time.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Officer John Barnes Act.
Section 1205 of title I of the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 (34 U.S.C. 10285) is amended by adding at the end the following:

subsection.text: Not later than 270 calendar days after receiving a claim filed under this subpart, the Bureau shall inform the claimant of the Bureau’s determination as to the claimant’s benefit eligibility.
